title: World Cup to use drones to help protect stadiums
description: Venues in Qatar will be defended from potential drone attacks by the unmanned aerial vehicles.

title: Abortion: YouTube removes misinformation videos
description: Videos promoting unsafe abortion methods and false claims are being taken down.

title: Twitter spent $33m in three months on Elon Musk deal
description: The social network also reported losses in its latest financial figures.

title: Snapchat owner hit as advertising slump hits sales
description: The California-based company is best known for the photo-sharing app Snapchat.

title: Tinder: Women's safety now at the heart of the app
description: The technology company is launching a partnership with domestic-violence campaign group No More.
